title: Tough action urged against trespassers dumping waste on burial mounds in A’ali
content: A NEW call has gone out for strict action against trespassers damaging the historic burial mounds in A’ali. This came after two men were secretly filmed by a resident dumping building refuse outside the fenced-off boundaries of the 4,000-year-old site on Tuesday morning .  You Might Like
